amendment.description: Amendment strikes certain reporting requirements for colleges and universities within sec. 131(f); and strikes sec. 495(a)(1) that would allow States to apply to the Secretary of Education to become recognized accreditors.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 109-401 to strike certain reporting requirements for colleges and universities within Sec. 131(f). The amendment also strikes Sec. 495(a)(1) that would allow states to apply to the Secretary of Education to become recognized accreditors.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gohmert amendment (A018) Agreed to by recorded vote: 418 - 2 (Roll no. 77).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Gohmert.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gohmert amendment (A018) Agreed to by recorded vote: 418 - 2 (Roll no. 77).
